petNameAdd:
1) STATE OF ASSAM
    Advocate - Tapan Kumar Bhattacharya

business_details.Business: Accused is present. Heard argument for both sides. Judgment delivered in the open court. The prosecution has failed to prove its case u/s 365 I.P.C and section 4 of POCSO Act against the accused beyond all reasonable doubt. Held, the accused is not guilty u/s 365 I.P.C and section 4 of POCSO Act Accordingly, the accused is acquitted and set at liberty. The bail bond of accused stands cancelled and the bailor is discharged from all liabilities. The case is disposed of.
